summary: During WW2 in Italy, Sergeant Joe Mooney is leading his small squad on the front-lines but is ordered to avoid rescuing a soldier trapped in no man's land.
cast: Bonar Colleano|Arthur Franz|Lee Marvin|Richard Kiley|Nick Dennis|James Griffith|Dickie Moore|George Cooper|Barney Phillips|Robert Nichols|Richard Grayson|Douglas Henderson|Mary Castle|Sue Casey|Jil Jarmyn|Mona Knox|Evelyn Lovequist|Joan McKellen|David McMahon|Kathleen O'Malley|Pat O'Malley|Angela Stevens
title: Ocho hombres de acero
